Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_DLS_processor

The function AIL_set_DLS_processor assigns the filter or mixer stages for a specific sample.

HPROVIDER AIL_set_DLS_processor(
  HDLSDEVICE dls,
  SAMPLESTAGE pipeline_stage,
  HPROVIDER provider
);

In Parameters

dls
specifies the HDLSDEVICE handle to use.
pipeline_stage
specifies the stage to assign the filter to. Use one of the SAMPLESTAGE constants.
provider
specifies the provider to set. Use zero to remove the current filter.

Returns

The previously installed provider value.

Discussion

This function is usually used to install a new filter processor.

Once a sample-specific filter has been installed, you can read sample-specific attributes with the AIL_filter_sample_attribute function and can change the sample-specific preferences with the AIL_set_filter_sample_preference function.

You remove an installed filter by calling this function with zero for the provider parameter.

Example files that use this function: Filter.CPP


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Functions: AIL_filter_sample_attribute, AIL_set_filter_sample_preference, AIL_set_sample_processor, AIL_set_stream_processor
Related Basic Types: HDLSDEVICE, HPROVIDER, SAMPLESTAGE
